summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for Saturday, August 10, 2019. It details staff assignments, shift changes, overtime, and leave statuses for correctional officers and other personnel. The document is significant as it provides a detailed operational snapshot of the facility on a specific date, likely relevant for understanding staffing and security protocols.

events.title: MCC New York Daily Operations
events.description: Standard daily operations at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, involving staff assignments, shift rotations, overtime, and leave management.

keyFacts: The document is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for Saturday, August 10, 2019.
It details shift assignments (e.g., 0000-0800, 0810-1400), posts (e.g., SHU, CONTROL, VISIT, LOBBY), and staff statuses (e.g., Sick Leave, Annual Leave, OT).
Multiple correctional officers are named, including Noel, T and Thomas, M, who appear frequently in shift change logs.
The roster includes a 'Recapitulation' section tallying total staff (108 Correctional, 18 Non-Correctional) and overtime occurrences (36).
The document provides a detailed, time-stamped log of personnel management, which could be relevant for understanding facility operations and staffing levels on a specific date.
